sections.heading: of public water system; license required
sections.text: No public water system shall be issued or otherwise hold a permit to operate a public water system, granted by the department, unless its operator possesses a license issued by the department.SourceLaws 1976, LB 821, § 7;Laws 2001, LB 667, § 38;Laws 2007, LB4

71-5307.Operator of public water system; license required.

No public water system shall be issued or otherwise hold a permit to operate a public water system, granted by the department, unless its operator possesses a license issued by the department.

SourceLaws 1976, LB 821, § 7;Laws 2001, LB 667, § 38;Laws 2007, LB463, § 1226.
